title: Weather Forecast App
description: A responsive web application that provides real-time weather updates using OpenWeatherMap API. Built with React and styled-components.

title: Task Manager
description: A full-stack task management tool with user authentication and task tracking. Built with MERN stack.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A sleek personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills. Fully responsive and SEO-friendly.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat app using WebSockets and Node.js. Supports multiple rooms and private messaging.
